00033   class service_base : private boost::noncopyable {
00034   public:
00035     typedef boost::posix_time::ptime ptime;
00036     typedef boost::shared_ptr<service_base> sptr;
00037     typedef boost::posix_time::time_duration time_duration;
00038     
00039     virtual ~service_base() {}
00040     
00041     virtual std::string     id()            const = 0; 
00042     virtual ptime           approx_ptime()  const = 0; 
00043     virtual boost::uint16_t stream_number() const = 0; 
00044     virtual std::string     stream_name()   const = 0; 
00045 
00046     virtual void              put_result(result_base::sptr ) = 0; 
00047     virtual result_base::sptr get_result(std::string ) const = 0; 
00048   protected:
00049   private:
00050   } ;

00053   class service_iq : public service_base {
00054   public:
00055     typedef boost::shared_ptr<service_iq> sptr;
00056     
00057     virtual ~service_iq() {}
00058

00060     virtual double          center_frequency_Hz() const = 0;
